rows.label: tlk4131014301_msg0001
rows.name:
You told someone like
me to stay here...

rows.label: tlk4131014301_msg0002
rows.name:
As I swore then, I will risk
my life to protect this
village and the Merc Group.

rows.label: tlk4131014301_msg0003
rows.name:
The way Jillwood looks at
me is painful, but...

rows.label: tlk4131014301_msg0005
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure Vandham-san
would have told me to stay, too.
